name: Ntfy Push Notifications
description: Sends push notifications to specific groups using ntfy. Supports message priority, tags, and titles.
author: Shinkai

serverUrl.description: HTTPS URL of ntfy server (e.g., https://ntfy.sh). Must be accessible. Default: https://ntfy.sh

topic.description: Channel name for notifications. Use ASCII chars, no spaces. Acts as public subscription topic

message.description: Main notification text content. Supports markdown formatting for rich text

title.description: Bold header text shown above message. Optional - uses topic name if not provided

priority.description: Delivery urgency: min (no alert), low (no sound), default, high (urgent), urgent (repeat)

tags.description: Tags with optional emoji (e.g., warning,:zap:). Format: tag1,tag2. Affects notification icon

success.description: True if notification delivered to ntfy server, false if server unreachable or error

message.description: Delivery confirmation or detailed error message if notification failed
